content.description: Sit start with hand/hands in bottom jug then hit the dual 2 finger hold and precede to top out using the hueco. Beware of alot of choss on top of the boulder.
content.location: Backside/North face of the boulder. Natural line on the west side.

content.description: Starts at poison ivy direct, until you hit slope ledge, traverse left into pocket and proceed up to sloper and crimp, then top out.
Sit start inside the small slot on the backside of the boulder with hands on compression rails. Head straight up through pockets and rails to the finish. IMO high quality for the area.
content.protection: I used one crashpad on top of the boulder behind this route.
content.location: North face of boulder inside the small slot to the east of the white streak.

content.description: A house sized boulder with potential and one exceptionally hard face. It is loacted in the NW gardens area across the gully behind Lost. One side of it is seen looking directly out of the Lost Boulder's roof (It's going to be the biggest rock face you can see basically).
